Package gw.api.filters

Interface IFilter

All Known Subinterfaces:
com.guidewire.pl.system.filters.BeanBasedQueryFilter, IBeanFilter, IQueryAndBeanFilter, IQueryFilter, IRDMRecordFilter, StandardQueryFilters.StandardQueryFilter
All Known Implementing Classes:
ActivityFilter, ActivityNoteFilter, ActivityPatternFilterSet.CategoryFilter, AssignedActivitiesFilter, ClaimInfoSecurityFilter, ClaimSecurityFilter, CommonActivitiesFilter, CompositionFilter, CoreFilters.AllFilter, CoreFilters.CompareNDays, CoreFilters.CreatedInLastBusinessWeek, CoreFilters.CreatedInLastNDays, CoreFilters.CreatedMoreThanNDays, CoreFilters.DateDueInNextNDays, CoreFilters.DateInLastBusinessWeek, CoreFilters.DateInLastNDays, CoreFilters.DateMoreThanNDays, CoreFilters.DaysBase, CoreFilters.Equals, CoreFilters.In, CoreFilters.NotEquals, DecentralizedAdminActivityPatternFilter, DecentralizedAdminFilter, DecentralizedAdminRoleFilter, DocumentFilter, ExposureFilter, GroupSecurityZoneFilter, NameValueFilter, NoPermissionsQueryFilter, NoteFilter, SafePersistingOrderInfoHelper.AllEntities, SafePersistingOrderInfoHelper.WithRulesOnly, ServiceRequestsInternalFilter, StandardBeanFilter, StandardQueryFilter, TransactionFilter, UnverifiedPolicySecurityFilter, WorkQueueInfoPage.AllActive, WorkQueueInfoPage.AllErrors, WorkQueueInfoPage.AllFailures, WorkQueueInfoPage.AllProblems
public interface IFilter
Used to mark objects which filter sets of information. It's rare to extend or implement this interface directly, most users will use the convenience classes StandardBeanFilter or StandardQueryFilter. Several PCF widgets (most commonly ToolbarFilterOption and ToolbarFilterOptionGroup) require objects that implement IFilter for filtering iterator data. Unfortunately the actual filter implementation needs to be wildly different, depending on the kind of data backing the iterator. An iterator backed by a query will need a filter that implements the IQueryFilter interface, while an iterator backed by an array or list will need one that implements IBeanFilter. So implementing IFilter is required for filters used in PCF widgets, but the widgets will do an additional cast at runtime to ensure the filter is the correct type for the backing data.
